mapper.sql: ONUM as oNum , ONAME as oName , OPRICE as oPrice, PNUM as pNum , INUM as iNum
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM OPT WHERE PNUM LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' ORDER BY ONUM ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM OPT WHERE ONUM = #{oNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPT ( ONAME, OPRICE, PNUM, INUM ) VALUES ( #{oName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{iNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC} )
